Title: What is the safest youtube for mp4 downloader for 2025?
Author: TitanJaxon
EnhancedContent:
Hi all, I need a reliable way to download youtube videos as MP4s, but I'm wary of sketchy mp4 downloader for youtube tools that might be malware traps or privacy nightmares.

What I want:

✔ Safe & malware-free (no shady installers or data harvesting) ✔ No forced ads or bundled crapware ✔ Still actively updated (YouTube changes break things fast) ✔ Supports decent quality (1080p+ ideally)

Are there any **safe youtube for mp4 downloader** that aren't just ad-filled web wrappers in 2025? Seen any good ones lately? Or should I just stick with CLI tools and deal with the setup?
